title: Did major news networks ignore a story about the Korean war continuing to return to the United States?
subtitle: A widely shared idea suggests that the major American news outlets largely ignored North Korea ' s return to the remains of the American soldiers killed during the 1950-53 war.
author: David Emery
vclaim: The main television networks MSNBC, NBC, CNN, CBS and ABC provided little or no coverage for the repatriation of the remains of 55 American soldiers killed in the Korean War in July 2018.
